channel.title: DeskFit Updates
channel.description: Updates for DeskFit - Your desk exercise companion

item.title: DeskFit 0.3.5
item.description:
DeskFit 0.3.5

Swift 6 compliance and enhanced Sparkle update system reliability.

  • Fixed all Swift 6 concurrency warnings and compliance issues
  • Resolved Sparkle XPC service runtime failures in development
  • Enhanced DEBUG/RELEASE build separation for better development experience
  • Improved update system error handling and recovery
  • Code quality improvements and unused variable cleanup
  • Maintained full production Sparkle functionality
  • Professional build process with proper code signing
